post.body: It was ruined for me when I found out Master Roshi wasn't going to be a pervert.
I'd hate to be sitting next to you then. lol
good call.
Guy Hagi was on it when he said it would hit is in 2 hours.
oooo please tell me! it's the perfect weather and time for a ghost story. :D
I hope you don't find it by stepping on it. :S
you can tell joey I said thanks a lot. :P
that's really the only song I like off that album. You should check out Treasure Fingers!!
well that is most definitely NOT my house. lol
lol yeah we're good here.
any tornado reports from Kauai?
Sorry, that's the total opposite side of the island from me. :( Can't see crap!
Not many Hawaii houses are equipped with those unfortunately. Good thing no tornado on my side of the island!
Someone I know told me it doesn't really work that well. I hope it works better for you!
Man parking there is a bitch. Good thing I lived right across of it. lol
This weekend is supposed to be the biggest moon of the year. Maybe it's something to do wtih that?
I don't think my parents would appreciate that. lol
through the outlets? thats crazy!
Nope, wasn't using a media player at the time.
Sailors warning?
It's doing that to me too.
oh no i'm thirsty too!!
whoa aldrine got a haircut!
you should keep that.
so basically, this album is everything you play at your shows? lol
My dad just got one yesterday!
Gah I know. I'll fix that in a sec.
because evidently God hates him. lol
Haven't changed anything! It just disappears! :(
I would totally fail at that.
whats your guys plans for the rest of the night?
Home, sitting. lol Totally forgot there was a sunday show.
whoa, you're still on kauai?
we were there one night and we didn't get served AT ALL. We were there like...2 or more hours.
I guess I just like the strictly acoustic stuff. Not a fan of the full band arrangements.
I stopped listening to Dashboard after that CD.
Using chopsticks the Japanese way. LMAO. http://bit.ly/15OBV

Oh snap, forgot about the show! Maybe we come watch tonight.
http://twitpic.com/s0co - tastes better the next day. :D
I wish you all could hear how loud the rain is here. I'll sleep well tonight.
hm...maybe I should turn off the computer? lol
And lightning!
Holy loud ass thunder!
Thanks @neenz!
Does anyone have any ghost stories? We're like 3 weeks behind. :S
The girls name in this Heald college commercial is Jelhoneylove. Thats a new one. lol
http://twitpic.com/rt81 - prepped and ready to go in the pot!
PORTUGUESE BEAN SOUP TONIGHT YAYYYYY!!!!
Rainy south winds. Feels strange.
I never realized how many of you were night owls! Maybe it's because it's a weekend.
Why do I always get the urge to clean really late at night?
heath ledgers acting in the interrogation scene in the dark knight...brilliant.
At 1246 PM HST National Weather Service Doppler radar continued to indicate a tornado. This tornado was located over Pakala Village...wtf!!!
Where the heck do you go when a tornado hits?
Waimea Big Save is flooded! Uncle Charlie has his hands full today.
For anyone that is confused, here you go: http://kgmb9.com/main/content/view/12360/270/
Someome is saying a tornado is heading towards Kauai. I'm no tornado expert, but I'm pretty sure tornados can't head here from elsewhere...
Just finished a lot of video gaming with Tyler.
12seconds - thunder! http://tiny12.tv/932CR
i hate my neighbors taste in music and the fact that he has to share it loudly with the rest of the neighborhood.
keahi tucker's ties are so mezmerizing
just took a little nap which i never do at night. my body feels weak and tired. might be getting sick.
No Keanu Reeves, don't do it!! http://bit.ly/AEx1
i hate when someone is trying to talk to you and they have headphones on and cant hear what youre saying. wtf man.
shama thrush outside my window. first time getting a good look at it. I think this is a female.

mom and dads ac wont turn on. i think my mom is going to have a heartattack. lol i dont know how she'll sleep without it!
dad left his wallet at longs. he got it back, sans money.
false alarm! found it.
omg. can't find my resume.
Even though I'm not reading from a book, the act of reading a story (which I haven't done in a while) feels absolutely wonderful.
